column2: We are going to practice counting numbers up until 30.
column4:
Counting means to say numbers one after the other in order. 
We can count the number of different things around us.

Count up by 1 to get the next number.

For example:
Ques: 4, 5, 6 
Ans: 7

Now you try ?? 

Write Yes to proceed.
column6: Write Yes to try some questions :-)
Start counting from 11. Keep counting 1 more. What comes after 14?
Start counting from 17. Keep counting 1 more. What comes after 19?
